age.note: Pixies mature at the same rate as humans and can live up to 200 years.

entries.name: Fey
entries: Your creature type is fey instead of humanoid.

entries.name: Pixie Magic
entries: At 3rd level, you can cast *faerie fire* once per long rest.
At 5th level, you can cast *sleep* once per long rest.
Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed.
Magic can't put you to sleep.

entries.name: Tiny Stature
entries: You can't wield weapons with the Heavy property.
You have disadvantage using equipment sized for Medium or larger creatures.

entries.name: Wings
entries: You have a flying speed of 40 feet.
You can't fly while wearing medium or heavy armor.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Sylvan.
